title: Modern open Floorplan
posting_body: Serene and luxurious, this community is conveniently located in the heart of the elegant Las Colinas area, just minutes from downtown, the Galleria shopping center and the Metroplex's finest recreational areas.

Bordering on scenic Lake Carolyn, the grounds are beautifully landscaped with courtyards and fountains as well as a lakeside promenade, resort-style pool and spa, fitness center, Yoga studio and MUCH more!
Please call or text Spirit Real Estate Group -
- refer to LC-MON-2 for more details about specials!
We are one of the premier locating services in Dallas.
Let us help you find your dream apartment!
Pricing and availability subject to change without prior notice.
